executeQuery

public abstract void executeQuery(java.lang.String queryString)

getHitCount

public abstract int getHitCount()
Searches for the given query string. By default (without specifying attributeName), search is carried out on all attribute fields. This functionality is enabled with the use of MultiFieldQueryParser.
